Properties.ProtectedString:
-- // Created by StarWars local CollectionService = game:GetService("CollectionService") local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local GearService = require(1075123174)
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle local SideBlade1 = Tool.SideBlade1 local SideBlade2 = Tool.SideBlade2 local Blade = Tool.Blade local AnimationsFolder = Tool:WaitForChild("Animations") local R6Folder = AnimationsFolder:WaitForChild("R6") local R15Folder = AnimationsFolder:WaitForChild("R15")
if Tool:FindFirstChild("Display") then Tool.Display:Destroy() end
Handle.Transparency = 0
SideBlade1.Transparency = 1 SideBlade2.Transparency = 1 Blade.Transparency = 1
CollectionService:AddTag(Blade, "roblox_lightsaber_blade")
local Sounds = { Open = Handle.TurnOn, Close = Handle.TurnOff, Hum = Handle.Hum }
local HitSounds = { 1194460845, 1194461060 }
local Animations = { Swing1 = {Animation = R6Folder:WaitForChild("Swing"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; Swing2 = {Animation = R6Folder:WaitForChild("Swing2"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; Swing3 = {Animation = R6Folder:WaitForChild("Swing3"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; }
local PossibleAnimations = { {Animation = Animations.Swing1, Audio = Handle.Swing}; {Animation = Animations.Swing2, Audio = Handle.Swing2}; {Animation = Animations.Swing3, Audio = Handle.Swing3}; }
local Gear = GearService:BindGear(Tool) Gear:SetupRemoteFunctions() Gear:SetupLocalScript("MouseIcon")
local Remotes = Tool:WaitForChild("Remotes") local ClientControl = Remotes:WaitForChild("ClientControls")
local ToolEquipped = false
local BladeDebounce = false Blade.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if BladeDebounce then return end BladeDebounce = true if hit and CollectionService:HasTag(hit, "roblox_lightsaber_blade") then -- make ligthsaber hit sound local HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://" .. HitSounds[math.random(#HitSounds)] HitSound.Volume = 0.2 HitSound.Parent = Handle HitSound:Play() Debris:AddItem(HitSound, 1) wait() elseif hit and hit.Parent then local Humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid ~= Gear.Humanoid then Humanoid:TakeDamage(60) wait() end end BladeDebounce = false end)
local SideBlade1Debounce = false SideBlade1.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if SideBlade1Debounce then return end SideBlade1Debounce = true if hit and CollectionService:HasTag(hit, "roblox_lightsaber_blade") then -- make ligthsaber hit sound local HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://" .. HitSounds[math.random(#HitSounds)] HitSound.Volume = 0.2 HitSound.Parent = Handle HitSound:Play() Debris:AddItem(HitSound, 1) wait() elseif hit and hit.Parent then local Humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid ~= Gear.Humanoid then Humanoid:TakeDamage(5) wait() end end SideBlade1Debounce = false end)
local SideBlade2Debounce = false SideBlade2.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if SideBlade2Debounce then return end SideBlade2Debounce = true if hit and CollectionService:HasTag(hit, "roblox_lightsaber_blade") then -- make ligthsaber hit sound local HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://" .. HitSounds[math.random(#HitSounds)] HitSound.Volume = 0.2 HitSound.Parent = Handle HitSound:Play() Debris:AddItem(HitSound, 1) wait() elseif hit and hit.Parent then local Humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid ~= Gear.Humanoid then Humanoid:TakeDamage(5) wait() end end SideBlade2Debounce = false end)
Gear:BindActivateFunction("kylo_lightsaber_activate", function() -- Play swing sound local RandomSwing = PossibleAnimations[math.random(#PossibleAnimations)] pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Gear.Player, "PlayAnimation", RandomSwing.Animation) ClientControl:InvokeClient(Gear.Player, "PlaySound", RandomSwing.Audio) end) wait(0.6) end)
Gear:BindEquippedFunction("kylo_lightsaber_equipped", function() for _, obj in next, Blade:GetChildren() do if obj and (obj:IsA("SurfaceLight") or obj:IsA("Beam")) then obj.Enabled = true end end
if Gear.Humanoid and Gear.Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animations = { Swing1 = {Animation = R15Folder:WaitForChild("Swing"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; Swing2 = {Animation = R15Folder:WaitForChild("Swing2"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; Swing3 = {Animation = R15Folder:WaitForChild("Swing3"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; }
PossibleAnimations = { {Animation = Animations.Swing1, Audio = Handle.Swing}; {Animation = Animations.Swing2, Audio = Handle.Swing2}; {Animation = Animations.Swing3, Audio = Handle.Swing3}; } else Animations = { Swing1 = {Animation = R6Folder:WaitForChild("Swing"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; Swing2 = {Animation = R6Folder:WaitForChild("Swing2"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; Swing3 = {Animation = R6Folder:WaitForChild("Swing3"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}; }
PossibleAnimations = { {Animation = Animations.Swing1, Audio = Handle.Swing}; {Animation = Animations.Swing2, Audio = Handle.Swing2}; {Animation = Animations.Swing3, Audio = Handle.Swing3}; } end
Blade.Transparency = 0
-- Play turn on sound ToolEquipped = true Sounds.Open:Play() delay(1.21, function() if Sounds.Open.IsPlaying and ToolEquipped then Sounds.Hum:Play() end end) delay(0.35, function() if Sounds.Open.IsPlaying and ToolEquipped then SideBlade1.Transparency = 0 SideBlade2.Transparency = 0 end end) end)
Gear:BindUnequippedFunction("kylo_lightsaber_unequipped", function() for _, obj in next, Blade:GetChildren() do if obj and (obj:IsA("SurfaceLight") or obj:IsA("Beam")) then obj.Enabled = false end end
ToolEquipped = false
Blade.Transparency = 1 SideBlade1.Transparency = 1 SideBlade2.Transparency = 1
-- Play turn off sound Sounds.Hum:Stop() Sounds.Close:Play() end)
